images.mining.display

Class SIFTDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.display.SIFTDraw

  • public class SIFTDraw
extends java.lang.Object
    This class enables a visualization of SIFT feature distributions on top of an image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SIFTDraw(Cluster[] visualObjectClusters, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image) 
      SIFTDraw(Cluster[] visualObjectClusters, java.lang.String imagePath)

    • Method Detail

      • drawClusterEllipsesOnImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage drawClusterEllipsesOnImage(RotatedEllipse[] ellipses,
                                                      java.awt.image.BufferedImage oldImage,
                                                      boolean useGradientDraw)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method draws the ellipses that correspond to SIFT clusters on top of an image.
        Parameters:
        ellipses - Array of RotatedEllipse objects corresponding to SIFT clusters.
        oldImage - Image that the ellipses will be drawn on top of.
        useGradientDraw - Whether to use gradients when drawing the ellipses.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage object that is the image with ellipses drawn on top.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClustersOnImageAsEllipses

        public static void drawClustersOnImageAsEllipses(ClusteredSIFTRepresentation features,
                                 java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                 java.lang.String outImagePath,
                                 boolean useGradientDraw)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method draws the ellipses that correspond to SIFT clusters on top of an image.
        Parameters:
        features - ClusteredSIFTRepresentation object representing clusters of SIFT features.
        image - Image that the ellipses will be drawn on top of.
        outImagePath - String that is the path where the new image will be persisted.
        useGradientDraw - Whether to use gradients when drawing the ellipses.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClustersOnImageAsEllipses

        public static void drawClustersOnImageAsEllipses(java.lang.String arffPath,
                                 java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                 java.lang.String outImagePath,
                                 boolean useGradientDraw)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method draws the ellipses that correspond to SIFT clusters on top of an image.
        Parameters:
        arffPath - String that is the path to the .arff file containing the ClusteredSIFTRepresentation that describes SIFT clusters on an image.
        image - Image that the ellipses will be drawn on top of.
        outImagePath - String that is the path where the new image will be persisted.
        useGradientDraw - Whether to use gradients when drawing the ellipses.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClustersOnImageAsEllipses

        public static void drawClustersOnImageAsEllipses(java.lang.String arffPath,
                                 java.lang.String inImagePath,
                                 java.lang.String outImagePath,
                                 boolean useGradientDraw)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method draws the ellipses that correspond to SIFT clusters on top of an image.
        Parameters:
        arffPath - String that is the path to the .arff file containing the ClusteredSIFTRepresentation that describes SIFT clusters on an image.
        inImagePath - String that is the path where the original image is stored.
        outImagePath - String that is the path where the new image will be persisted.
        useGradientDraw - Whether to use gradients when drawing the ellipses.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClusteredSIFTImage

        public static void drawClusteredSIFTImage(java.lang.String arffPath,
                          java.lang.String inImagePath,
                          java.lang.String outImagePath)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Draws arrows corresponding to SIFT features on an image and colors them according to their clusters. The arrow length corresponds to the scale at which the particular SIFT feature was found.
        Parameters:
        arffPath - String that is the path to the .arff file containing the ClusteredSIFTRepresentation that describes SIFT clusters on an image.
        inImagePath - String that is the path where the original image is stored.
        outImagePath - String that is the path where the new image will be persisted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClusteredSIFTImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage drawClusteredSIFTImage(Cluster[] siftClusters,
                                                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage oldImage)
                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Draws arrows corresponding to SIFT features on an image and colors them according to their clusters. The arrow length corresponds to the scale at which the particular SIFT feature was found.
        Parameters:
        siftClusters -
        oldImage - Image that the arrows will be drawn on top of.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage object that is the original image with the arrows corresponding to SIFT feature drawn on top, colored according to their respective clusters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClusteredSIFTImage

        public static void drawClusteredSIFTImage(java.lang.String arffPath,
                          java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                          java.lang.String outImagePath)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Draws arrows corresponding to SIFT features on an image and colors them according to their clusters. The arrow length corresponds to the scale at which the particular SIFT feature was found.
        Parameters:
        arffPath - String that is the path to the .arff file containing the ClusteredSIFTRepresentation that describes SIFT clusters on an image.
        image - Image that the arrows will be drawn on top of.
        outImagePath - String that is the path where the new image will be persisted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawSIFTImage

        public static void drawSIFTImage(java.lang.String arffPath,
                 java.lang.String inImagePath,
                 java.lang.String outImagePath)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Draws arrows corresponding to SIFT features on an image. The arrow length corresponds to the scale at which the particular SIFT feature was found.
        Parameters:
        arffPath - String that is the path to the .arff file containing the corresponding SIFTRepresentation.
        inImagePath - String that is the path to the original image file.
        outImagePath - String that is the path to where the new image is to be saved.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawSIFTImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage drawSIFTImage(LFeatRepresentation features,
                                         java.awt.image.BufferedImage inImage)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Draws arrows corresponding to SIFT features on an image. The arrow length corresponds to the scale at which the particular SIFT feature was found.
        Parameters:
        features - SIFTRepresentation object holding the features to be drawn.
        inImage - BufferedImage as the basis for the drawing. This object is not modified by the method, as the copy is made prior to the drawing.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage that the features have been drawn on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawSIFTGoodnessOnImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage drawSIFTGoodnessOnImage(LFeatRepresentation features,
                                                   float[] featureGoodness,
                                                   java.awt.image.BufferedImage inImage)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Draw a red-green overlay on top of an image where the landscape corresponds to the utility of visual words occurring in certain image regions.
        Parameters:
        features - SIFTRepresentation that holds the features of the image.
        featureGoodness - Array of float values between zero and one.
        inImage - BufferedImage holding the image that is to be processed.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage object that is the new image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • drawClusters

        public void drawClusters(java.lang.String outPath)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Draw clustered SIFT features on an image and save the result.
        Parameters:
        outPath - String that is the file path denoting where to save the resulting image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • info

        public static void info()
        Prints out the usage information.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads in an arff file of clustered SIFT features and draws the corresponding cluster ellipses on an image and saves the resulting image.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments, as specified in the info() method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
